name: Modules.Nfc.TagTechnologyNfcV
summary: Provides access to NFC-V (ISO 15693) properties and I/O operations on a Modules.Nfc.NfcTag.

methods.name: getDsfId
methods.summary: Return the DSF ID bytes from tag discovery.

methods.name: getMaxTransceiveLength
methods.summary: Return the maximum number of bytes that can be sent with transceive.

methods.name: getResponseFlags
methods.summary: Return the Response Flag bytes from tag discovery.

methods.name: transceive
methods.summary: Send raw NFC-V commands to the tag and receive the response.
